statements: SELECT * FROM backup_data;
SELECT id, data FROM backup_data;
SELECT data FROM backup_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM backup_data ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, data FROM backup_data WHERE id > 5;
SELECT * FROM backup_data WHERE id = 1
SELECT data ->> 'name' AS name FROM backup_data WHERE data @> '{"name": "John"}'
SELECT id, data FROM backup_data WHERE data @> '{"age": 30}' ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT * FROM backup_data WHERE data @> '{"department": "IT"}' AND data -> 'position' = 'Manager' LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM backup_data WHERE data @> '{"status": "active"}' OR data @> '{"status": "inactive"}'
SELECT * FROM backups;
SELECT backup_id, backup_timestamp FROM backups ORDER BY backup_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM backups WHERE backup_location = 'S3';
SELECT backup_id, backup_timestamp FROM backups WHERE backup_timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT recovery_id, recovery_timestamp, recovery_status FROM disaster_recovery ORDER BY recovery_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM backups WHERE backup_location = 'New York' LIMIT 10;
SELECT recovery_timestamp, recovery_status FROM disaster_recovery WHERE recovery_location = 'California' ORDER BY recovery_timestamp DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT backup_location FROM backups;
SELECT backup_timestamp, backup_location FROM backups WHERE backup_location != 'Texas' ORDER BY backup_timestamp ASC;
SELECT recovery_id, recovery_timestamp, recovery_location FROM disaster_recovery WHERE recovery_status = 'pending' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM backups WHERE id = 1;
SELECT backup_name, backup_date FROM backups ORDER BY backup_date DESC;
SELECT server_id, recovery_method, recovery_time FROM disaster_recovery WHERE recovery_status = true;
SELECT task_name FROM automated_tasks WHERE task_type = 'Maintenance';
SELECT * FROM backups LEFT JOIN disaster_recovery ON backups.id = disaster_recovery.server_id;
SELECT * FROM backups WHERE backup_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT backup_name, backup_date FROM backups ORDER BY backup_date DESC
SELECT * FROM disaster_recovery WHERE recovery_status = true
SELECT server_id, recovery_method FROM disaster_recovery WHERE recovery_time < now()
SELECT task_name, task_type, task_schedule FROM automated_tasks WHERE task_schedule BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND now()
SELECT * FROM backups;
SELECT backup_name, backup_location FROM backups WHERE backup_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT recovery_status, recovery_location FROM disaster_recovery ORDER BY recovery_date DESC;
SELECT db_name, db_size FROM databases WHERE db_owner = 'Admin';
SELECT platform_name, platform_owner FROM platforms WHERE platform_type = 'Cloud';
SELECT * FROM backups;
SELECT backup_id, backup_name, backup_date FROM backups WHERE backup_location = 'Cloud';
SELECT db_name, db_size FROM databases ORDER BY db_size DESC;
SELECT recovery_id, recovery_status, recovery_date FROM disaster_recovery WHERE recovery_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY recovery_date ASC;
SELECT platform_name, platform_type, platform_owner FROM platforms WHERE platform_owner LIKE '%Admin%' ORDER BY platform_name;
SELECT * FROM backup_jobs;
SELECT job_name, scheduled_time FROM backup_jobs WHERE job_id = 1;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM disaster_events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT plan_name, plan_description FROM recovery_plans WHERE plan_id = 5;
SELECT log_time, log_message FROM recovery_logs WHERE plan_id = 3 ORDER BY log_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM backup_jobs WHERE job_name LIKE '%database%';
SELECT job_name, scheduled_time FROM backup_jobs ORDER BY scheduled_time DESC;
SELECT job_name, backup_type FROM backup_jobs WHERE scheduled_time > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY job_name ASC;
SELECT b.job_name, h.backup_status, h.backup_time FROM backup_jobs b JOIN backup_history h ON b.job_id = h.job_id WHERE h.backup_status = 'SUCCESS';
SELECT r.plan_name, COUNT(l.log_id) AS log_count FROM recovery_plans r LEFT JOIN recovery_logs l ON r.plan_id = l.plan_id GROUP BY r.plan_name HAVING log_count > 5;
